message:
SYSTEM: 4._methodologies-Concpt-REEng.pdf: Página 20
Ontological Engineering 
©Asunción Gómez-Pérez,
Logical Patterns. Definition
• Elements of the OWL module from the NeOn 
metamodel or compositions of those elements.
• Content-independent 
– Expressed with only a logical vocabulary (OWL 
namespace)
• Solve logical modelling problems
• Affect only a specific and delimited part of the 
ontology
• Examples:
– Primitive and defined class, subClassOf relation, n-ary 
relation, etc.
speaker: SYSTEM
